jld.title: Let Clients Know You Offer Video Chat & Conferencing
description: To help individuals and businesses find lawyers who do video conferencing, we have added a new "Offers Video Chat" filter to our Justia Lawyer Directory search. There will also be a "Video Chat & Conferencing" badge on your profile and in the listing pages. This lets visitors easily find lawyers who offer video chat and conferencing services.

Offering video chat and conferencing can make interactions more personal and provide a better client experience. We encourage every lawyer to update their profile and select the video services that they offer. If you do not currently offer video chat or conferencing services, you can start now!
